charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] came across an Eevee
and Poké Kid Eve quietly staring at each other.
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_0402_0600_10: I’d be so happy if I could!
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_0700_10: Um! I was just observing my Eevee!
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_0800_10: Oh! Did you just look troubled?
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_0900_10: Hold on. Let me take some notes so I don’t forget!
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_1000_10:
This kind of detail usually isn’t written in the
Pokédex...
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_1100_10:
If you wanna pretend to be an Eevee, it’s
important to observe and study them daily!
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_0401_1300_10:
Uh-huh! I’ve been reading books and studying all
kinds of things!
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_1600_10:
If it’s something I love, it’s easy to memorize
everything about it!
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_1700_10: That’s why I especially know a lot about Eevee!
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_1800_10:
For example, Eevee’s genetic structure isn’t
stable...
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_1900_10:
so they evolve easily depending on all sorts of
reasons, like where they live!
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_2400_10:
I don’t know much about Pokémon other than
Eevee, though...
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_2500_10:
My friends have a favorite Pokémon they know a
lot about, too.
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_2600_10:
Do you have a favorite Pokémon,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_0401_2800_10:
Really? Is it because Pikachu is always by
your side?
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_0302_2900_10: I don’t think I can choose...
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_0402_3000_10:
I know that feeling! There are just so many
cute Pokémon!
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_3100_10:
If you pretend to be a Pokémon, you’ll learn to
love them even more!
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_3200_10:
So, why don’t you try to become a Pokémon too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_3300_10:
You can do things like crawl through dry grass and
hide behind rocks...
charaepi_ch0656_00_ibu/2301_1201_3400_10:
I think it’d be so fun if I could play with you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
